name: nyt_archive_browser
description: Browse archived NYT articles by month.

scripts.dev: node index.js & npm run copy-vendor & npm run build-css:dev & npm run watch-copy-js
scripts.build-production: npm run build-css:prod && npm run copy-js && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-vendor
scripts.build-css:prod: rm -rf static/css/**/* && node-sass --output-style='compressed' --include-path sass/partials sass/*.sass static/css/main.css
